## Enumerations

### enum  {#a753cd347a2578a1d1a4c3a6141c238f4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>enum llvm::PointerIntPairInfo::MaskAndShiftConstants : uintptr&#95;t</>}>

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a753cd347a2578a1d1a4c3a6141c238f4a3a51956fad564a5f8c9a923b17963cfa" />
<EnumerationListItem name="PointerBitMask">
PointerBitMask - The bits that come from the pointer (=
        ~(uintptr&#95;t)(((intptr&#95;t)1 &lt;&lt; PtrTraits::NumLowBitsAvailable) - 1))
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a753cd347a2578a1d1a4c3a6141c238f4a1dd9e7252764042009f043bb2a8ad5f7" />
<EnumerationListItem name="IntShift">
IntShift - The number of low bits that we reserve for other uses, and keep zero (= (uintptr&#95;t)PtrTraits::NumLowBitsAvailable - IntBits)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a753cd347a2578a1d1a4c3a6141c238f4aadb9eb34960575d9dd59b4b765c1fd25" />
<EnumerationListItem name="IntMask">
IntMask - This is the unshifted mask for valid bits of the int type (= (uintptr&#95;t)(((intptr&#95;t)1 &lt;&lt; IntBits) - 1))
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a753cd347a2578a1d1a4c3a6141c238f4a3bceb0d2563c4e0a9df22ae7b81b9387" />
<EnumerationListItem name="ShiftedIntMask">
 (= (uintptr&#95;t)(IntMask &lt;&lt; IntShift))
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>
